name: Super Ultra Mega Gumball
description:
This game was inspired by difficult, unforgiving games like Jump King, which have no checkpoints and require some skill to succeed in. I've always loved the "easy to learn, hard to master" idea for a game, and that's Super Ultra Mega Gumball - just use WASD to move, and then get ready for a challenge.

CREDITS:

Literally Everything: Alex Taylor (Me)
